law.text:
In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated:
"Authority" means a parking authority established under § 14-304 of this subtitle.
"Bond" or "bonds" means any revenue bond issued by an authority pursuant to this subtitle.
"County" means Prince George's County, Montgomery County, or Baltimore City.
"Local law" means a legislative act of the county in which an authority is located.
"Property" means any real or personal property or any interest in real or personal property, and includes any franchise or easement.
